Name: Ghost Town Mine Ride & Shootin' Gallery
About the game: 'Ghost Town Mine Ride & Shootin' Gallery' is a thrilling new interactive VR horror experience designed for the HTC Vive. In this approximately 25 minute scenario, you are exploring an abandoned tourist attraction, The 'Ghost Town Mine Ride & Shootin' Gallery', built at the site of the old Black Rock Mines, which many claim is actually haunted! Equipped with a flashlight and six shooter, you must keep your wits and have a steady aim if you hope to make it out alive! Features both on-foot and on-rails sequences! Warning! This is a high speed horrifying thrill ride that could cause motion sickness for certain users. User discretion is advised. Vive Headset and controllers required! Available for Arcades on SpringboardVR Available for Arcades on SynthesisVR
